name: Neonator
description:
It's parody of the 80s sci-fi action movies like Tron, Terminator as well as the neon look of the 80s.

Shoot and kill all enemies. Collect power-ups (green, blue or orange beams).

Thanks GrandBeats.com for awesome soundtrack and sfx.

Controls

  • Move : WASD
  • Shoot: Arrows

To get past the first menu, press E
